Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 8th overall pick, by Tampa Bay in 2013...
Had first career hit on 9/15/2014, off Joe Beimel (OAK)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/20/2014, off Huston Street (TOR)...
Had 5 hits with 8 RBI against Boston on 8/29/2015...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 2015, hitting .260 with 25 HR, 101 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/14/2016, hitting .440 with 4 HR, 13 RBI...
Was selected to the 2016 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Minnesota on 9/1/2016...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Cleveland on 8/3/2018...
Hit 3 homeruns against Boston, driving in 3 runs on 8/10/2018...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/13/2018, hitting .393 with 4 HR, 10 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Boston on 9/4/2018...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/2020, hitting .340 with 10 HR, 28 RBI...
Hit 3 homeruns against Toronto, driving in 6 runs on 9/21/2022...
Signed as a free agent by New York (A) on 2/7/2023 to a 3-year deal worth $12,550,450 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/29/2023, hitting .485 with 3 HR, 13 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/2023, hitting .381 with 8 HR, 34 RBI...
Was selected to the 2023 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/7/2023, hitting .500 with 4 HR, 9 RBI...
